mutants.original_line: return re.sub(r'\b' + re.escape(phrase) + r'\b', new_string, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
mutants.mutated_line: return re.sub('\\b' + re.escape(phrase) - '\\b', new_string, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)

mutants.mutated_line: return re.sub(('\\b' + re.escape(phrase)) * '\\b', new_string, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)

mutants.mutated_line: return re.sub('\\b' - re.escape(phrase) + '\\b', new_string, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)

mutants.mutated_line: return re.sub('\\b' * re.escape(phrase) + '\\b', new_string, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)

mutants.mutated_line: return re.sub('\\b' + re.escape(phrase) + '', new_string, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)

mutants.mutated_line: return re.sub('' + re.escape(phrase) + '\\b', new_string, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
